title: Wearable Calc (Basic)
summary: A basic calculator for wearable devices (watches)

descriptionHTML:
A basic calculator for wearable devices (watches)

This calculator can work both with round dials and square dials. Here are some functions that can be performed with this basic calculator app for wearables

1. Android app for wearable device (watches).

2. Perform basic calculation such as Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication & Division.

3. Continuous calculation facility for user those who are not interested to click “=” button every time.

4. “Clear Single Text” & “Clear All” will gives you to clear result area for reuse again.

5. Separate layouts designs for “Square” & “Round” shape wearable watch’s.

6. Easy operate of all buttons and calculation functionalities.

Happy Calculating!!
comments: Awesome app Nice app for my wearable device. Easy type and nice UI. Keep improving
